content: This will be handy for our little extension to Atlas that allows importing concepts into a code-set based on a ValueSet $expansion. @John Grimes

more on this. I'd like to assign FHIR URIs to the OMOP vocabularies. I added a couple of what I propose in rows 10 and 11 here: https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/1ykzbW-RMRJV4doIpZANibu45WveLFoFA/edit#gid=2038668198 and I'd like to register a base OID for OMOP and assign them all OIDs too.
are people happy with the approach shown?

I have a proposal re: completing this table on the agenda in the Terminologies Subgroup meeting, Monday 1Nov21 2p Eastern. https://confluence.hl7.org/display/OOF/OMOP+on+FHIR+Terminologies+Subgroup+Meeting+-+Monday+1Nov21
